name: Burford Advertising
description: Burford Advertising is a full service agency located in Richmond, VA. We handle local, regional and national accounts. We've been in business since 1969 by doing campaigns that work, not just get awards. We admit it. We were once caught up in the advertising awards game. Throughout our agency’s history, we’ve won thousands of those certificates and trophies that get your name in the paper and can lead you to believe that winning awards is what advertising is all about.
